scripts.build: mkdir -p build; cp package.json build; cd build; npm install --production; cd ..; docker build -t pushbuttonfun.com/$npm_package_name:latest .
scripts.start: docker rm -f $npm_package_name; docker run -d --name $npm_package_name -p 4000:4000 -e MONGO_SERVICE_HOST="10.0.0.111" --network bridge pushbuttonfun.com/$npm_package_name:latest
